basic_info.name: MINI Cooper S Convertible
basic_info.description: MINI Cooper S Convertible is a 5-seater Hatchback available at a starting price of Rs. 58.5 Lakh. The car is available in 1 variants, with 1 engine and 1 transmission option. Additionally, Cooper S Convertible offers a Ground Clearance measurement of 146 mm and a Boot capacity of 215 liters. The mileage of the Cooper S Convertible varies from 16.8 KM/L depending on the model.

Introduction: Mini launched the 2025 edition of the Cooper S Convertible in India in December 2025.
It is imported as a completely built unit (CBU) and was priced at Rs 58.50 lakh (ex-showroom).
The biggest USP of this compact cutesy car is its open roof for a wind-in-the-hair experience.
This fabric roof can be lowered or raised in 18 seconds and 15 seconds, respectively.
It has a ‘sunroof mode’ where the top slides open partially.
And interestingly, all of these mechanisms can happen at speeds of up to 30kmph.
Mini Cooper S Convertible - Exterior: In typical 'Mini' style, the new Cooper S Convertible also features circular LED headlamps.
Then, there's an octagonal grille and the taillights which come integrated with a Union Jack graphic.
The car rides on big 18-inch alloy wheels filling the wheel wells nicely.
It even has a black plastic cladding around the wheel arches, side skirts, and bumpers.
Mini Cooper S Convertible - Interior: Inside, the Cooper S Convertible sports a minimalistic dashboard.
Again, in typical 'Mini' style, it boasts a circular 9.4-inch OLED touchscreen in the centre.
The Cooper S also gets a two-spoke steering wheel with a head-up display.
Features like a Harman Kardon sound system, wireless Android Auto and Apple CarPlay, ambient lighting, and a wireless charger are standard.
There are even features such as a rearview camera and a driver’s seat with massage function.
Powertrain of the Mini Cooper S Converti: Under the bonnet of the Mini Cooper S Convertible is a 2.0-litre, four-cylinder, turbo-petrol engine.
This mill produces 201bhp and 300Nm of torque, and power is sent to the front wheels.
On the transmission front, the engine comes mated to a seven-speed dual-clutch automatic transmission.
Interestingly, Mini claims a 0-100kmph time of 6.9 seconds and a top speed of 237kmph.
